website_summaries.verdict: A uniquely designed squat machine that targets the legs, gluts, and core.
pros: Compact build makes this perfect for home gyms big and small
Parts are sturdy and set up is quick and easy
Allows for squats, push ups, and sit ups
Can incorporate resistance bands and dumbbells

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine I've managed to do the standup situps on it. I had seen a ab bench that was $399.99...so I continued to look and found the multifunctional squat machine. The price is great and I added padding in the middle and was able to do my standup situps..did I mention the price 🤗 Easy to assemble...Great price...Thank you
customer_reviews.author: CeeCee

customer_reviews.title: it makes squats easier
customer_reviews.text: I can usually do squats 10~12 at a time, and with help of this tool, I can do more than 20 at a time easily
customer_reviews.author: coco's mom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Right now I use it with a band wrapped on my pull up bar for assistance. I've already switched to a smaller band. I'll have a true review in 90 days.
customer_reviews.author: jragster

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, easy to use and easy to store. Works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Cranfill

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love this for the price you can’t beat it it is very sturdy easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Rh

customer_reviews.title: Don't miss leg day!
customer_reviews.text: What else can I say? It does what it's suppose to do with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Serves the purpose. Sturdy and for the price it's well built. Not like the one I use at my gym, but in days I don't feel like taking the drive to the gym it serves the purpose
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I do 200 squats more than three times a week. It makes a pretty apple butt to prevent knee pain.
customer_reviews.author: smilestf

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Producto it’s just like the pictures works great and it’s light easy to move around, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Mora

customer_reviews.title: Not foldable but strong construction
customer_reviews.text: Its not foldable so keep that in mind, you need to have space for it. The product is overall usable, but it has some weird asymmetry, the wellding is not in the same place from one side to another. The rolls are too thin so its a little uncomfortable but still can use it with a towell at the begining and then get used to it. The rolls for the calves are kind of short and cant move. I guess you get what you pay, but overall is better than ding squats without anything
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was able to do full squats for the first time with the help of this equipment. Very helpful
customer_reviews.author: Joon-suk Park

customer_reviews.title: non adjustable knee pad.
customer_reviews.text: Can be hard on the knees if you are over 5' 5". One with adjustable knee pad would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A. Ballor

customer_reviews.title: Useful and modestly priced exercise tool
customer_reviews.text: This item was the most inexpensive of all the selections, but was pretty easy to assemble, and serves 2-3 purposes well. I refer to sissy squats, really isolating the quad and stressing it nicely; sit-ups, especially in conjunction with an inflatable gym ball; and stretches. It can also help in push-ups. All in all, a solid investment.
customer_reviews.author: eugene m brennan

customer_reviews.title: It could be more useful.
customer_reviews.text: I think it is missing a seat so we could work our back tight. I tried to use a seat I have at home but it’s not sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Find better
customer_reviews.text: Not the most dependable equipment. Mine didn’t even come with all the Pieces to assemble to now, it’s pretty much useless.
customer_reviews.author: OurkidChief

customer_reviews.title: World's smallest sissy squat
customer_reviews.text: This product is everything advertised. It is perfect for me (I stand 4'-9"); for anybody of average or above height, this is probably not for you. The assembly instructions were concise and even thoughtful - they emphasized the importance of stretching prior to exercising!
customer_reviews.author: Graysen

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble. Very sturdy and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Arlet Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Reccomend!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me since I'm short. My daughter even uses the push up side of it. Instructions are clear and easy. Very sturdy piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not For Adults
customer_reviews.text: If you are over four feet tall, the sissy squat will be useless to you. I've used commercial sissy squat equipment in the past and know how they should function. The Goplus does not even come close. The foot plate is way too narrow to stand on and the rear pads don't reach high enough behind your calves to provide stable support when executing the exercise. It was a poor choice on my part. I advise against this product. Save your money and invest in a quality equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Jaques

customer_reviews.title: Home Gym Glow Up
customer_reviews.text: This added so much variety to my home workouts. I highly recommend this if you het fit ay home.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Squat
customer_reviews.text: Do the perfect squat with this machine! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described! Sturdy frame with comfortable leg cushions. 10 minute assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable price!
customer_reviews.text: I am definitely satisfied with this product. It was so easy to assemble. I was able to workout right away with this. The price is unbeatable. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sepi

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble, doesn’t take up much room.
customer_reviews.text: I love this sissy squat machine. I’m having a problem developing my quads and I think this will definitely help. Very easy to assemble and does not take up any room at all in my home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Simply Spotless

customer_reviews.title: Sissy squats made easy
customer_reviews.text: I love this, simply put! Very easy to assemble and use! It’s very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Best BUY so far..
customer_reviews.text: Excellent..worth every penny...even though its already a great price..love it works well
customer_reviews.author: GREGreal

customer_reviews.title: Does the Trick
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. The unit was relatively easy to assemble; took me all of 20 minutes to assemble. I incorporate the squat machine with my in home workout routine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Easy to assemble and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Z.

customer_reviews.title: Better than i expected
customer_reviews.text: I love this little machine in minutes put my outter quats on Fire 👌😎
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Makes my knee hurts
customer_reviews.text: all of my family members used it and they all said it makes their knee hurt.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: It was cool my mum liked it she works out at the house I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Torres

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This is way too small thought it was bigger a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Quinestz Tillman Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Refund demanded
customer_reviews.text: This product is horrible! The foam pads should be located directly behind your knees, they care against the middle of my calf, making it impossible to do a proper sissy squat. The pressure on my lower back when trying it out was very painful! Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mazur

customer_reviews.title: This machine is a joke
customer_reviews.text: This thing is for toddlers not for any one above 4 feet tall Don’t buy unless yo are shorter than 4 feet tall and weigh around 50 lbs
customer_reviews.author: Maya Elly Arriaza

customer_reviews.title: Works great with no moving parts to break
customer_reviews.text: I'm five foot six inches tall and the pads fit nicely against the back of my calves. Nothing flexes in the assembly and there are no noises at all. Should last 10 years and beyond.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon Wagon

product_meta.title: Goplus 3-in-1 Multifunctional Squat Machine Deep Sissy Squat & Leg Exercise Squat for Home Gym Fitness Equipment
feature_bullets: 【3-in-1 Multifunctional Squat Machine】 As a versatile exercise machine, it combines a variety of core training functions, such as deep sissy squat, sit-ups and push-ups to provide appropriate physical exercise for the abdomen, buttocks and legs. Effectively targeted the quadriceps and gluteal muscle and strengthen the knee and hip joints.

【Durable Steel Construction with Large Load Capacity】 The equipment was designed to withstand any use because of durable steel. With sturdy construction, the squat machine is stable and durable enough for long time use. Perfect for you to exercise in office or home.

【Non-slip Foot Plate with 6 Foot Pads for Safety】 Equipped with stainless steel base and non-slip foot plate, strengthens its stability and safety. The black foam is comfortable and soft, and it does not rub the feet, which greatly protects the feet from injury.

【6 Levels Height Adjustable up to 5.5"】 The height of front pole can be adjusted up to 5.5”. Before exercise, the calf should be closed to the high elastic black foam for protection, and the height of the footrest foam can be adjusted according to the height of the foot.

【Unique Construction for Extra Exercise】 There are two small circles at the front of the squat machine, which can be used for rope exercise. You can also do exercise with rope or dumbbell, which is easy to get from website or local department.
